title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, the tool items move below the label. This behavior does not occur on build 20011116 on Nt2000.
OB: On Linux, when resizing a view like the Navigator to a smaller size, the tool items move below the label.
EB: The tool items should not move below the label when resizing a view like the Navigator to a smaller size on Linux.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator view on Linux.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
Expected behavior: The tool items should stay in their original position relative to the label when resizing the view.
